column4: Having a weird issue in new ubuntu 10.10 install... Whenever I try to run something with "./" I get file not found... Any ideas?
But it does... For example... If I were to do "sh somescript.sh" it works but "./somescript" does not
But its everything i try to run and not scripts i personally created... Scripts that run fine on other computers
you might need to add at the top line something like #! /bin/sh
